# Shrikant Kadu - Product Leader

> A high-range Product Leader specializing in building and scaling products across Fintech, Marketplace, Consumer Social, and AI infrastructure. Experience spans three continents (USA, Germany, India) and stages from 0-to-1 startups to billion-dollar global platforms.

## Core Identity & Philosophy
* **Identity:** Product Leader with a focus on adaptability and solving hard problems in unfamiliar territory.
* **Philosophy:** Starts from user reality, builds systems over individual heroics, and leverages constraints as fuel for innovation.
